name: OCR
author: ow0x
TrustyJAID
short: Detect text in images through OCR.
description: Detect text in images through OCR.
install_msg:
**NOTE FOR BOT OWNER:**

This cog uses free ocr.space API which may give subpar results.

**`[OPTIONAL]`**
There is optional support for Google Cloud Vision OCR API for improved text detection.
(requires you to have a Google cloud project with active enabled billing account).
You may read more on that over at:
<https://gist.github.com/ow0x/a7f17deaea4612a7dba4ba707210f7d8>
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
